title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 361-7.6 - Recordkeeping and reporting requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 361-7.6 - Recordkeeping and reporting requirements

State Regulations
(a) In lieu of the full recordkeeping
requirements identified in subdivision
360.19
(k) of this

Title, the facility must maintain the following records: (1)

The date of receipt and disposal of all
end-of-life vehicles must be recorded and maintained on-site. (2)

Routine inspection logs in accordance
with subparagraph 360.19(k)(2)(ii) of this Title. (b) The facility must submit an annual report
as required in paragraph 360.19(k)(3) of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
361-7.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
